title: Rita Dove, Teatro Publico de Cleveland & 12 Hours of Terror
teaser: Dee Perry welcomes former US Poet Laureate and Akron native - Rita Dove - to discuss the literacy project that's bringing her back home to Northeast Ohio.  Plus we raise the curtain on the Cleveland-based Latin American theatre ensemble - Teatro Publico de Cleveland - onstage at Cleveland Public Theater for National Hispanic Heritage Month.  And Cleveland Cinemas' Dave Huffman gets us ready for Halloween with the upcoming late-night film fest - 12 Hours of Terror - coming to The Capitol Theater.
